articles.content: The US housing market went haywire over the past two years for a simple reason: There just weren't enough homes to meet overwhelming demand. But now one research firm is warning of a new threat loomi… [+14016 chars]

articles.author: Silvia Amaro, Matt Clinch
articles.title: ECB's chief economist sees double-sided risk of spiraling inflation and an economic slowdown - CNBC
articles.description: European Central Bank Chief Economist Philip Lane said the Frankfurt institution will have to remain vigilant over the coming months.
articles.content: European Central Bank Chief Economist Philip Lane said the Frankfurt institution will have to remain vigilant over the coming months with the prospect of inflation spiraling ever higher alongside the… [+2357 chars]
